name: Anne Y. LOWER, Appellant, v. David A. LOWER

parties: Anne Y. LOWER, Appellant, v. David A. LOWER.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
LARSEN, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Mark Clement, Morton B. DeBroff, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Michael A. Steger, Smiley, McGinty & Steger, Pittsburgh, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
613 A.2d 1205
Anne Y. LOWER, Appellant, v. David A. LOWER.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 22, 1992.
Decided Oct. 14, 1992.
Mark Clement, Morton B. DeBroff, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Michael A. Steger, Smiley, McGinty & Steger, Pittsburgh, for appellee.
